review: So I just bought a big bad ass 60 inch LED smart TV which already has Netflix built-in as well as the ability to all-connect to the internet. So I have access to internet TV, YouTube and Netflix on that TV no problem in the man cave.But! My living room TV didn't have anything built into it so I decided to try out Chromecast.Setup was a breeze! You can be setup in a minute or two! On screen instructions are provided when you power up the Chromecast and browse for its WiFi signal through your TV's settings.Now, I can watch anything I want wireless from the internet on my TV! No more long and painful nights being stuck in my computer chair just to watch Netflix!Anyone who loves to watch YouTube videos, Netflix or Hulu will absolutely adore Chromecast!PROS:Watch anything you'd normally watch on the internet on any TV in your house when you connect it to Chromecast!CONS:You should have a fast internet connection to eliminate buffering and increase and enhance playability on larger TV screens. This is important for screen resolution and the overall quality of the media you plan to play.
